CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 19, 1969, pg. 15 reads: "Crown Choir Queen - The vestry of Homewood AME Zion Church was transformed into a veritable Summer Garden scene for the pretty tea sponsored recently by members of the Cathedral Choir of the church. In an impressive Coronation Ceremony, Marie Sanchez was crowned "Queen for the Year."  The choir president, Theadore Hatcher, places the jeweled crown on the head of the winner, while Mrs. Phoebe Nelson, the chairman, stands looking on.  Other members of the Royal Court are, seated left to right, Mrs. Helen Burch, Patsy Walters, Debby Brogden and Jean Whitner.  Principals, not in picture are, Francis Samulels, Mrs. Gertrude Bell and Earl Russell. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Theadore Hatcher, placing crown on "Queen for the Year" Marie Sanchez, with court, from left: Helen Burch, Patsy Walters, Phoebe Nelson, standing; Debby Brogden, and Jean Whitner, posed on stage in Homewood AME Zion Church, another version
